recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.summary: Crispy toast topped with creamy avocado and a fresh finish.
steps: Toast the bread until golden and crispy.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on toast.
Top with chili flakes and a tiny drizzle of olive oil if you want.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.summary: Creamy Alfredo pasta with tender chicken.
steps: Boil pasta in salted water and drain.
Season and cook chicken; slice it.
Melt butter, sauté garlic for 30 seconds.
Add cream, simmer 2-3 minutes, then mix in parmesan.
Combine pasta with sauce, add chicken on top and serve.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.summary: Fresh, crunchy, and classic Mediterranean flavors.
steps: Chop tomatoes and cucumber, slice onion.
Add olives and crumble feta on top.
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, pepper.
Pour dressing and toss gently.

recipes.title: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipes.summary: Quick single-serve chocolate cake made in a mug.
steps: Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, baking powder in a mug.
Add milk and oil, mix until smooth.
Add chocolate chips if you want.
Microwave 60-90 seconds (watch it so it doesn’t overflow).

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.summary: Fluffy pancakes perfect with syrup and fruit.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, melted butter separately.
Combine wet + dry; don’t overmix (small lumps OK).
Cook on a lightly oiled pan: 2-3 minutes per side.

recipes.title: Tomato Soup
steps: Sauté onion in olive oil until soft.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds.
Add tomatoes and stock, simmer 15-20 minutes.
Blend until smooth, season with salt and pepper.
Optional: add a small splash of cream.
